first_para: Sir Malcolm Gray Bruce, PC (born 17 November 1944) is a British Liberal Democrat politician.

full.extract:
Sir Malcolm Gray Bruce, PC (born 17 November 1944) is a British Liberal Democrat politician.
He is the Member of Parliament for Gordon and has been the chairman of the International Development Select Committee since 2005. He has been deputy leader of the Liberal Democrats since January 28 2014.
full.title: Malcolm Bruce
